channel.title: Wayward Sons: Legends - Sci-Fi Full Page Webcomic - Updates Daily
channel.description: The daily Science Fiction adventures of the Ulympeans as they battle the Tytans in earth's distant past. Their epic wars will inspire every myth, legend, fantasy and fairy tale in human history. Full color, full page comic book style webcomic that updates daily.
channel.copyright: All images, characters, content and text are Copyright and TM Benny Powell. All rights reserved. No portion of this content, in whole or in part, may be redistributed without the explicit written permission of the author.
